{"id":924651408,"question_id":15,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1680157918,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"647 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/924651408/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"50.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public List<List<Integer>> threeSum(int[] nums) {\n        Set<List<Integer>> res = new HashSet<>();\n        \n        int len = nums.length;\n        \n        Arrays.sort(nums);\n        \n        \n        for(int i=0; i<len-2; i++){\n            \n            int j = i+1;\n            int k = len-1;\n            while(j<k){\n                \n                \n                if(nums[i] + nums[j]+ nums[k]==0){\n                    res.add(Arrays.asList(nums[i], nums[j], nums[k]));\n                    j++;\n                    k--;\n                }else if(nums[i] + nums[j]+ nums[k]>0){\n                    k--;\n                }else{\n                    j++;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return new ArrayList<>(res);\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
